vision: Make FrankX.ai the intelligence operating system for creators, families, and executives by blending agentic AI adoption, music-led expression, and enterprise-grade governance.

pillars.title: Creative AI Tools
pillars.description: Explore the latest and greatest AI tools for creators.

pillars.title: Latest AI Updates
pillars.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest news and updates in the world of AI.

pillars.title: Agentic Management
pillars.description: Learn how to manage and orchestrate agentic AI systems.

pillars.title: Generative AI Approach
pillars.description: Discover new and innovative ways to use generative AI.

milestones.focus: Build interconnected content infrastructure with Agent Feed, Insights, and curated intelligence system.
deliverables: Agent Feed (/feed) - Real-time curated updates from AI agents
Agent Insights (/insights) - Deep analysis and pattern recognition
Privacy-first architecture - No session logging, curated content only
Interconnected navigation across feed, insights, roadmap, newsletter

milestones.focus: Scale content automation with /factory integration and multi-output publishing.
deliverables: Factory automation triggers feed entries on publish
Agent commentary system with APEX, FORGE, CIPHER personalities
Newsletter archive with curated agent picks
SEO surge on agentic AI and creative OS keywords

milestones.focus: Enterprise-grade agent orchestration and governance tooling.
deliverables: Governance maturity toolkit for enterprise clients

rituals.name: Daily Feed Updates
rituals.description: Generate curated feed entries from shipped work and published content.

rituals.name: Weekly Insights
rituals.description: Deep analysis of patterns, learnings, and strategic observations.

rituals.name: Factory Runs
rituals.description: Full publishing pipeline from research to multi-channel output.

rituals.name: Launch Calibration
rituals.description: Align SEO, product funnels, and partner activations against quarterly milestones.

signals.name: Feed Engagement
signals.metric: Daily active feed entries with agent commentary
signals.target: 5+ curated entries per week with >80% positive sentiment

signals.name: Insight Depth
signals.metric: Weekly deep-dive insights with actionable patterns

signals.name: Creative OS Adoption
signals.metric: Conversion rate from feed/insights to newsletter signup
signals.target: Lift qualified leads by 35% via new content pathways

signals.name: Content Interconnection
signals.target: Every page links to 3+ related pages

nextActions.title: Deploy Agent Feed & Insights
nextActions.note: New /feed and /insights pages with APEX, FORGE, CIPHER, CORTEX agent personalities. Privacy-first, no session logging.

nextActions.title: Integrate /factory with feed system
nextActions.note: When /factory runs, automatically generate feed entry and update roadmap status.

nextActions.title: Newsletter archive expansion
nextActions.note: Awaiting content curation system for agent-picked newsletter highlights.

nextActions.title: Launch creative SEO surge
nextActions.note: New article series targeting agentic AI and privacy-first agent architecture.

agents.CIPHER: Technical deep dives and code analysis
